title: Peer Review Platform
description: Developing a web service for students and freelancers to outline projects and define collaborator roles upfront.
Users can post project descriptions, specify required tasks, and receive feedback or volunteer reviews through an integrated dashboard.

title: Database Application for Event Management
description: Developed a full-stack database application using Java, JDBC, and DB2 with stored procedures, indexing, and data visualizations.
Implemented a CLI app with over 5 interactive features and optimized queries using custom indexes.

title: BERT-based News Classifier
description: Fine-tuned BERT on the AG News dataset for multi-class classification.
Compared performance between probing methods (KNN, Logistic Regression) and end-to-end training.
Visualized attention matrices to interpret model predictions.

title: Neural Network from Scratch for Image Classification
description: Implemented multilayer perceptrons and convolutional neural networks on the Kuzushiji-MNIST dataset.
Compared different architectures, activation functions, and regularization techniques.
Achieved high test accuracy through experimental evaluation.

title: Colosseum Survival AI Agent
description: Developed a game-playing AI agent for a 2-player territory control game with strategic movement and wall placement.
Utilized search-based algorithms and heuristics to maximize spatial control.
Evaluated in a tournament of over 1000 games against peer agents, achieving top-tier performance.

title: Banking System in MIPS Assembly
description: Built a banking application supporting account creation, deposits, withdrawals, transfers, and loan operations in MIPS assembly.
Managed data via memory-mapped I/O and stored transaction history in arrays.
Implemented comprehensive error handling and input parsing using syscalls.

title: Recursive Contour Filling & File I/O
description: Implemented a recursive region-filling algorithm for 2D binary images parsed from ASCII text.
Generated .pbm outputs to visualize filled contours.
Developed helper subroutines for file I/O and 1D-to-2D data mapping.

title: Custom Operating System
description: Developed a minimal operating system in C from the ground up.
Implemented process management, scheduling, heap and page-based memory management.
Designed basic file system support and system call interfaces.

title: Healthcare Database System
description: Designed an entity-relationship model for a healthcare database.
Implemented backend services in Java with PostgreSQL, enforcing ACID-compliant transactions.
Optimized CRUD operations with indexing and constraint management.

title: Semantic Analysis of Tweets using NLP
description: Applied TF-IDF and latent semantic analysis via SVD for topic modeling of tweets.
Trained sentiment classification models and evaluated performance using RMSE and accuracy metrics.

title: SOCS Website Backend Development
description: Built the backend of a website in PHP using MVC architecture.
Implemented authentication middleware and RESTful API endpoints in MySQL.
Enhanced performance through caching strategies and lazy loading.
